title: Ip Error after store disabled yesterday
body: So I'm in the top right corner it shows that I have 1803 ip but i went to buy a hextech champ thing and it said not enough, I went to but a rune and it says under the price the new balance is 1688 ip, not sure if it's a client display issue on the new client or if something else is causing a display glitch in how much I have. Just trying to bring this to people's attention, it appears that the "new balance: 1688" is the actual amount I have and it's just displaying wrong next to my to and summoner icon.

replies.body:
This issue can sometimes occur if there's a hiccup with your Balance updating. It usually takes a purchase or an *attempted-purchase* to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Targons Blade, I just attempted this and it did not work unfortunately. I currently have 6500 IP and am unable to purchase a champion. feelsbadman.

Damn, sorry to hear that. =[

If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll take a look at what's going on and see if we can influence this situation from our side.

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
Something must've changed but I am not sure what. It is no longer an issue, thanks friend for trying to assist anyway!

I'm having the same issue... and i've seen at least three other people with the same problem.. if you have any more news on the issue it would be appreciated.... sitting at 6417 ip can't buy a champ D:
I don't have any more news, but if you create a ticket as I mentioned above, we can resolve this with you.
